modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.

type.description:
## Modify Lava Speed

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_lava_speed)

Modifies how fast the entity that has the power moves in lava.

Type ID: `origins:modify_lava_speed`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_lava_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "addition",
        "value": 0.4
    }
}
```

This example will make the player swim/walk significantly faster in lava.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Lava Speed (Power Type) date: 2021-04-06

Modify Lava Speed

Power Type

Modifies how fast the entity that has the power moves in lava.

Type ID: origins:modify_lava_speed

Fields

Field Type Default Description
modifier Attribute Modifier optional If specified, this modifier will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.
modifiers Array of Attribute Modifiers optional If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the movement speed while in lava.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:modify_lava_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "addition",
        "value": 0.4
    }
}

This example will make the player swim/walk significantly faster in lava.
